UNiagaraSystemFactoryNew    
UNiagaraValidationRule_BannedDataInterfaces This validation rule can ban the use of certain data interfaces on all or a subset of platforms.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_BannedModules This validation rule can ban the use of certain modules on all or a subset of platforms.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_BannedRenderers This validation rule can ban the use of certain renderers on all or a subset of platforms.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_CheckDeprecatedEmitters This validation rule will check if a system uses emitters that are tagged as Deprecated using the Niagara Asset Tags.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_EmitterCount This validation rule can be used to apply budgets for emitter count.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_FixedGPUBoundsSet This validation rule ensures that GPU emitters have fixed bounds set.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_GpuUsage This validation rule that can be used to ban GPU usage on the provided platforms or warn that GPU emitters might now work correctly.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_HasEffectType This validation rule will check if a system has an effect type assigned.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_InvalidEffectType This validation rule always fails and can be used to mark a default/test effect type as stand-in that must be changed.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_LWC This validation rule checks for various common issue with Large World Coordinates like mixing vector and position types.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_NoFixedDeltaTime This validation rule is used by modules or effect types to warn that they don't support systems with fixed delta time ticks.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_NoMapForOnCpu This validation rule checks that map for nodes are not used with cpu scripts (as they only work on gpu).  
UNiagaraValidationRule_NoOpaqueRenderMaterial This validation rule is used by the collision module to check that renderers don't use any opaque or masked materials when depth buffer collisions are used.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_NoWarmupTime This validation rule ensures that systems don't have a warmup time set.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_RendererCount This validation rule can be used to apply budgets for renderer count.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_RendererSortingEnabled Checks to see if renderers have sorting enabled on them or not.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_RibbonRenderer This validation rule is for ribbon renderers to ensure they are not used in situations that can cause compatability or performance issues.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_SimulationStageBudget This validation rule can be used to enforce a budget on the number of simulation stages and the iterations that may execute.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_SingletonModule This validation rule checks that a module is only used once per emitter/system stack.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_TickDependencyCheck Validation rule to check for unwanted tick dependencies.  
UNiagaraValidationRule_UserDataInterfaces This validation rule checks to see if you have exposed user data interfaces.  
UUpgradeNiagaraEmitterContext Wrapper class for passing results back from the version upgrade python script.  
UUpgradeNiagaraScriptResults Wrapper class for passing results back from the version upgrade python script.  
UVolumeCacheFactory Factory for creating volume texture
